templates.name: @extension-js/action
templates.description: Action popup example. Opens a toolbar popup with a simple page.

templates.name: @extension-js/action-chatgpt
templates.description: React action popup example. Opens a toolbar popup and renders a basic React UI.

templates.name: @extension-js/action-locales
templates.description: Action popup example demonstrating i18n with _locales and message placeholders.

templates.name: @extension-js/content
templates.description: Content script example that injects a small badge into web pages to demonstrate DOM injection and styling in an extension.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-css-modules
templates.description: Content script example styled with CSS Modules. Injects a small badge and shows how to scope styles in content scripts.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-custom-font
templates.description: Content script example that loads custom web fonts. Demonstrates font files and web_accessible_resources setup.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-env
templates.description: Content script example that reads environment variables (.env) and renders a small UI.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-less
templates.description: Content script example styled with Less. Injects a small badge and shows how to organize styles with Less in content scripts.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-less-modules
templates.description: Content script example using Less with CSS Modules. Injects a small badge and shows how to scope Less styles in content scripts.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-multi-one-entry
templates.description: Content script example with four scripts listed in one entry. Each script injects a small element.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-multi-three-entries
templates.description: Content script example split across three entries (2 + 1 + 1). Each script injects a small element.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-preact
templates.description: Content script example rendered with Preact. Mounts a small UI inside a Shadow DOM on any page.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-react
templates.description: Content script example rendered with React. Mounts a small UI inside a Shadow DOM on any page.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-sass
templates.description: Content script example styled with Sass. Injects a small badge and shows how to organize styles with Sass in content scripts.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-sass-modules
templates.description: A browser extension content script example built with Extension.js using Sass CSS Modules. Demonstrates scoped styles for content scripts with Sass preprocessing.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-svelte
templates.description: Content script example rendered with Svelte. Mounts a small UI inside a Shadow DOM on any page.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-typescript
templates.description: Content script example built with TypeScript. Mounts a small UI and uses typed modules.

templates.name: @extension-js/content-vue
templates.description: Content script example rendered with Vue. Mounts a small UI inside a Shadow DOM on any page.

templates.name: @extension-js/init
templates.description: A basic browser extension example built with Extension.js. A starting point for developers learning current browser extension tooling.

templates.name: @extension-js/javascript
templates.description: JavaScript-based extension with a sidebar panel. Adds a sidebar with a simple page.

templates.name: @extension-js/new
templates.description: New tab page example using plain JavaScript. Renders a simple page you can customize.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-browser-flags
templates.description: A browser extension example built with Extension.js demonstrating browser-specific features and flags. Shows how to handle browser differences across targets.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-config-eslint
templates.description: New tab page example with ESLint configured. Shows how linting is set up in an extension project.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-config-prettier
templates.description: New tab page example with Prettier configured. Shows how formatting is set up in an extension project.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-config-stylelint
templates.description: New tab page example with Stylelint configured. Shows how CSS linting is set up in an extension project.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-crypto
templates.description: New tab page example demonstrating basic crypto operations inside an extension.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-env
templates.description: New tab page example demonstrating environment variables (.env) in an extension project.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-less
templates.description: New tab page example styled with Less. Renders a simple page and organizes styles with Less.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-preact
templates.description: New tab page example rendered with Preact. Loads a small Preact app you can extend.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-react
templates.description: A browser extension new tab page example built with Extension.js and React. Demonstrates a React-based new tab page with a working build and preview flow.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-react-router
templates.description: New tab page example using React Router. Shows multiple routes inside the new tab app.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-sass
templates.description: New tab page example styled with Sass. Renders a simple page and organizes styles with Sass.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-svelte
templates.description: New tab page example rendered with Svelte. Loads a small Svelte app you can extend.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-typescript
templates.description: A browser extension new tab page example built with Extension.js and TypeScript. Demonstrates a type-safe new tab page with a working build and preview flow.

templates.name: @extension-js/new-vue
templates.description: New tab page example rendered with Vue. Loads a small Vue app you can extend.

templates.name: @extension-js/preact
templates.description: Preact-based extension with a sidebar panel. Adds a sidebar with a simple page.

templates.name: @extension-js/react
templates.description: React-based extension with a sidebar panel. Adds a sidebar with a simple page.

templates.name: @extension-js/sidebar
templates.description: Sidebar panel example. Adds a sidebar to the browser with a simple page.

templates.name: @extension-js/sidebar-monorepo-turbopack
templates.description: Sidebar + content_script monorepo example using Extension.js with Turbopack.

templates.name: @extension-js/sidebar-shadcn
templates.description: React sidebar example using shadcn/ui components. Adds a sidebar panel with a simple React page.

templates.name: @extension-js/sidebar-transformers-js
templates.description: Sidebar example that runs a small Transformers.js demo inside a side panel.

templates.name: @extension-js/special-folders-pages
templates.description: Opens a welcome page on extension load, showcasing the pages/ folder.

templates.name: @extension-js/special-folders-scripts
templates.description: Demonstrates scripts/ folder organization and how to run standalone scripts via the extension.

templates.name: @extension-js/svelte
templates.description: Svelte-based extension with a sidebar panel. Adds a sidebar with a simple page.

templates.name: @extension-js/typescript
templates.description: TypeScript-based extension with a sidebar panel. Adds a sidebar with a simple page.

templates.name: @extension-js/vue
templates.description: Vue.js-based extension with a sidebar panel. Adds a sidebar with a simple page.
